en.title: Promotion: 4 Months FREE Maintenance.
en.content:
Great News! For the month of October and November 2007, FE is having a PROMOTION whereby All New Members will be provided with FOUR(4) months FREE MAINTENANCE (including the month of joining).

Hurry! Get your prospects to JOIN NOW!

meta.description:
Great News! For the month of October and November 2007, FE is having a PROMOTION whereby All New Members will be provided with FOUR(4) months FREE MAINTENANCE (including the month of joinining)
Hurry! Get your prospects to JOIN NOW
meta.author: klhunter

bm.title: FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, 18th April 2009.

meta.description:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam on 18th April 2009 was a great success attended by 600 Leaders, Members, VIPs and invited guests. FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting attended together with Founder Director KS Lee and FE's Spokesman, Champion Bodybuilder Wong Hong.There were around 20 FE Malaysian Leaders, including several Presidential Directors who were there to support their local network in Vietnam. Among the local VIPs who attended was the wife of the Deputy Prime Minister of Vietnam, Madam Ho Cong Can, Mr Ly Duc (Champion Bodybuilder and former Mr Vietnam now FE's Spokesman for Vietnam), Miss Phan Thi Ngoc Diem (Miss Tourism International Vietnam 2008 and also FE Spokeswoman Vietnam), etc. Highlights of the event include:
- Welcome Speech by Vietnam Country Licensee, represented by GM Nguyen Hoang Huy.
- Vietnamese Cultural Show performances.
- Opening Speech by FE's Founder Director KS Lee.
- Product Talk and Demos by FE's Product Consultant Master Yap. Many in the audience have not seen the
power of FE's Quantum Pendant and were simply bowled over by Master Yap's demos!
- Sharing and product demos by FE's Presidential Director KC Phoon who as usual impressed the audience.
Thank you, KC!
- Testimonial and Sharing by FE's Vietnam Spokesman, Champion Bodybuilder and former Mr Vietnam,
Ly Duc.
- Mock Cheque, VND 50 million (RM 10,000) presentation to Special Needs Children Football Championships,
represented by Miss Hoa, by FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee, witnessed by
FE's Vietnam Country Licensee Doan Nguyen.
- Recognition of New Directors in Vietnam.
- Sharing and Motivation by FE Director KC Tey and FE Presidential Directors Ricky Lim, Allan Yeo and
Paul Lee.
- Lucky Draws
A BIG THANK YOU to Miss Phan Thi Ngoc Diem and Miss Nguyen Tran Kim Hoan (Angelina) for a great job MC'ing for the night a
meta.keyword: FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, 18th April 2009.
meta.author: klhunter
